console.bootup-message: ACPL Console - last stable release {} - {} - CC-BY-SA

modify-ini.debug-state-modified: Option debug-state modified correctly in startup.acpl-ini with value {}.
modify-ini.lang-modified: Option lang modified correctly in startup.acpl-ini with value {}.
modify-ini.use-colors-modified: Option "use-colors" modified correctly in startup.acpl-ini with value {}
modify-ini.debug-state-help:
HELP : the "debug-state" statement asks if you want to enable or disable devlopper debug.
Type : boolean.
Default : False.
Actual : {}.
modify-ini.lang-help:
HELP : the "lang" statement is used to know in which language the system is displayed.
Type : string.
Possible options : "en", "fr", or "nl".
Default : en.
Actual : {}.
modify-ini.use-colors-help:
HELP : the "use-colors" statement is used to know if you prefer to use colors or not. Some OS or softwares does not allow it.
Type : bool√©en.
Possible options : "True" or "False".
Defaut : True.
Actual : {}.
modify-ini.process-time-round-numbers:
HELP : the "process-time-round-numbers" statement is used to know how many numbers will be behind the dot for the processing time.
Type : integer.
Default : 6.
Actual : {}.
modify-ini.else-help:
Available values :
	- "debug-state"
	- "lang"

Type "modify-ini help <statement>" for better help.

help.about: Gives a special message from the author concerning the language ;)
help.version: Gives the last stable version and the actual dev build.
help.modify-ini: Modifies a specific statement in the ini file. Better help with 'modify-ini help all'.

critic-errors.NameError_LanguageFile: Unable to load the language file !

update-checker.ask-install: Do you want to install it ?
update-checker.unable-to-install:
This version makes changes to the update_checker file. Because of that, we are unable to install it automatically (unless you want everything to be deleted).
What we can do is downloading and extracting the new version in the folder where ACPL is installed.
So :
	- Go check the "ACPL-master" folder in the folder where ACPL is installed.
	- Type "end" in the console.
	- Copy-paste the content of "ACPL-master" AFTER CLOSING THIS WINDOW and replace all old files.
